Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I just got initiated into the wonderful world of astronomy, having been gifted an Orion SkyQuest XT10 Dobsonian telescope for my birthday. Or rather, 2 Orion telescopes. (They shipped me another by accident )

Can any of you give me some tips as to how to use it? I'd like to look at galaxies and nebulae, but looking at the outer planets is fine too.

Hmmm, never heard of it, is it good?

*quick Google search*

Good lord! That's quite a present. I'm filled with envious emotions! Hope you have fun with it.
